description:
"I wanna create electronic music but I don't know how"

"I end up being confused whenever I open up FL Studio"

- A Producer

If you think creating electronic music is hard. Well, Think Again!

This course is designed for those who want to create electronic music without having any prior music skill.

Key Features of the course -

1. Made for Everyone (Beginners can learn from scratch, Pros can brush their skills).

2. Well Structured (Includes basic skills and Complex techniques).

3. All Important Topics Are Covered (From Mixing and Mastering to basic side-chain).

This course is structure in a beginner friendly way, it provides all the detail from scratch.

The following describes the course in a better way -

  • INTRODUCTION

Students start by doing nothing but some minor changes in the looks of the Digital Audio Workstation. This gives students a brief intro and does not panic them by not giving any tough task in the beginning.

  • THE BASICS

Students learn about the things which are must to start producing electronic music. They also learn about the significant changes that have been made in FL Studio 12. This section covers some basic techniques which include :

  1. Using Channel Rack
  2. Using The Browser
  3. Using The Mixer
  4. Using The Piano Roll

& more.

This section also includes some lectures on how to use everything to create a finished track.

  • ADVANCE TECHNIQUES

This section covers up everything you need to know to take your production level to the next level. 

This section includes these techniques -

  1. Layering
  2. Working With Presets
  3. Side-chaining
  4. Sampling
  5. Sound Designing
  6. Advance Mixing
  7. Working With Vocals

The final section has the juice of everything we've learned. We will end what we started in a bright way by creating our own music style.

This will include -

  • Creating a new project 
  • Remembering what we like (it's our style!)
  • Using the knowledge we've gained
  • Creating what we want
  • Making some tweaks
  • Exporting

The structure of this course might seem wrong, but believe it or not it has been arranged in such a way, which gives you the best learning experience.


This will end the course but...... for you it's just a beginning!
title: Making Electronic Music with FL Studio 12
